name: The Vision Of The Ant
description:
An adventure set in a dark fantasy world filled with monsters, demons, and depraved souls.
Despite these dangers, an Ant travels these unforgiving lands hunting his arch nemesis "Natas" to revenge his family.

  • Recruit Monsters - Enslave and turn them into powerful allies.
  • Procedural Generation - Use your creatures to fight your way through randomly generated dungeons and randomized quests.
  • Choose How You Play - Choose a unique class to level, then customize your character further as you play.
  • Explore a Rich World - Explore three unique areas each with their own set of dangers such as monsters, bosses and quest.
  • Hard, but Fair - Play a game designed for players looking for a challenging but rewarding experience.
  • Open Project - Edit or change out every graphic and sound in the game.
